CodeClear.​NaturalDocs.​Engine.​Output.​Builders.​HTML
CodeClear.​NaturalDocs.​Engine.​Output.​Builder
CodeClear.​NaturalDocs.​Engine.​CodeDB.​IChangeWatcher
CodeClear.​NaturalDocs.​Engine.​Files.​IChangeWatcher
IDisposable
CodeClear.​NaturalDocs.​Engine.​SearchIndex.​IChangeWatcher
public
CodeClear.​NaturalDocs.​Engine.​Output.​Builders.​HTML
Functions
BuildSourceFile
protected void BuildSourceFile (
int fileID,
CodeDB.Accessor accessor,
CancelDelegate cancelDelegate
)

Builds an output file based on a source file.  The accessor should NOT hold a lock on the database.  This will also build the metadata files.

DeleteOutputFileIfExists
public void DeleteOutputFileIfExists (
Path outputFile
)

If the passed file exists, deletes it and adds its parent folder to <foldersToCheckForDeletion>.  It's okay for the output path to be null.

Path Functions
Source_OutputFolder
public Path Source_OutputFolder (
int number,
Path relativeFolder = default(Path)
)

Returns the output folder of the passed file source number and, if specified, the folder within it.  If the folder is null it returns the root output folder for the file source number.

Source_OutputFolderHashPath
public string Source_OutputFolderHashPath (
int number,
Path relativeFolder = default(Path)
)

Returns the hash path of the output folder of the passed file source number and, if specified, the folder within it.  If the folder is null it returns the root output folder hash path for the file source number.  The hash path will always include a trailing symbol so that the file name can simply be concatenated.

Source_TopicHashPath
public string Source_TopicHashPath (
Topic topic,
bool includeClass = true
)

Returns a hash path representing a specific Topic within an output file.  If it returns null, you should use the hash path for the class or file without a topic anchor.
